item.description:
Wonderful bluesy folksy singer songwriter - check him out at chrissmither.com.

NATIONAL PUBLIC RADIO: [Smither] taps his foot to keep the rhythm, much like the late blues legend John Lee Hooker.  His finger-picked guitar lines are sleek, unhurried and insistent.  And then there's the voice -equal parts gravel and molasses, Smither's singing sounds like a distillation of the folk and blues heroes he grew up listening to in New Orleans.

COST:

The $1 is the organizer fee (to help me pay the Meetup fee) but you'll need to purchase your own ticket on the website which costs $27 pp in advance. Tickets could sell out fast - buy your own tix at Brown Paper tickets website - or check out the Me and Thee Website for the link.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet for dinner before (TBD) or at the Me and Thee (UU Church in Marblehead)
item.name: Chris Smither at the Me and Thee in Marblehead
